title: Nos Tempos do Imperador
overview: The work, which begins in 1856, a little more than 30 years after the independence of Brazil, is a period plot that takes place in a Brazil that is still searching for its identity and follows important moments in the life of Emperor Dom Pedro II, of Empress Teresa Cristina, by Lu√≠sa, the Countess of Barral, as well as Pilar and Jorge/Samuel, over the years.
